text: Saya menginap di bulan des 2018, malam hari ketika mau parkir di basement ternyata lot parkir sudah penuh semua. Security mengarahkan untuk parkir di pinggir jalan depan hotel dan menjanjikan ada penjagaan 24 jam. Pagi hari setelah breakfast, saya berniat memindahkan mobil ke area basement hotel, ternyata mobil saya hilang dan tidak ada di tempat semula. Security yang jaga saat itu di area entrance hotel juga tidak tahu menahu perihal mobil saya. Akhirnya saya ke lobby dan bertemu FO cewek, dia pun tampak bengong, selang beberapa menit muncul FO cowok dengan gampangnya dia bilang bahwa mobil saya diderek dishub karena beberapa minggu sebelum nya ada pemberitahuan ke pihak hotel tidak boleh parkir di pinggir jalan! Berarti tidak ada koordinasi yang baik antara FO dan security! Hotel macam apa bisa terjadi seperti ini? Bila anda pemilik mobil innova/pajero/fortuner mohon pertimbangkan sebab akses parkir ke basement cukup sempit, kamar hotel tidak memiliki peredam suara yang cukup baik, anda akan mendengar suara langkah kaki dari lorong, atau suara tamu di kamar sebelah yang sedang menerima telp padahal suara nya tidak terlalu lantang. Kamar mandi sempit, keramik kolam renang ada beberapa yang lepas, kolam renang tidak terlalu besar. Pada waktu breakfast, sang pelayan cuma mengambil piring dan gelas tamu sebelum saya sedangkan remahan roti, nasi yang tercecer dan bekas air minum yang di meja tidak dibersihkan. Akhirnya kami harus membersihkan sendiri menggunakan baby wipes yang kami bawa.Note buat pihak hotel: terimakasih atas hadiah natal berupa didereknya mobil saya dan terima kasih karena hilangnya tail pipe knalpot mobil saya dan rusaknya bemper mobil karena penderekan. Terimakasih karena koordinasi yang baik antara pihak FO dan security sehingga muncul kejadian ini.
title: Staff tidak profesional, resto jorok

text:
Tgl 21 saya memesan 1 unit kamar di Hotel GrandDdhika, Hotel ini terlihat dari luar kecil namun setelah saya masuk area Lobby hotel ini bagus, terlihat dari Main Lobby nya yg tinggi untuk menghilangkan dan terkesan luas.

Masuk area receptionis saya dilayani dgn baik tidak lbh dari 5 menit, dengan ornamen lantai berbentuk batik merah tua terlihat baik sekali untuk lobby dan Receptionis saya nilai 8

Saya mendapatkan kamar di lantai 5 tepatnya 5.., area kamar cukup bersih dan nyaman, untuk remote A/C terletak di sebelah tempat tidur ini sangat baik sekali krn orang tidak perlu jalan untuk ini saya nilai 8

Untuk kamar mandi, ini yg perlu di perhatikan karena letak kamar mandinya diagonal dan antar pintu dgn wastafel ada jarak cuman 10 smp 15 cm ini terlihat sempit sekali namun kebersihan tetap baik, untuk orang yg sedikit besar harus hati2 jika ingin masuk, untuk ini saya kasih nilai 6,5

Untuk Kolam renang terletak di lantai 5, kolam renang dengan 2 buah kolam satu untuk anak dan satu untuk dewasa, ini cukup baik dgn kaca yg terlihat jelas, namun yg perlu di perhatikan adalah lantai Kolam renang lantai keramiknya banyak yg terlepas sehingga bisa meninbulkan cidera pada kaki, untuk ini saya kasih nilai 7

Lalu untuk sarapan pagi, sarapan pagi terletak disamping receptionis, untuk menu sangat biasa sekali tidak ada yg istimewa, untuk rasa perlu banyak perbaikan, untuk staff di area makan hanya 1 orang dgn melayani banyak orang hal ini menyebabkan banyak piring kotor yg blm dimabil walaupun sdh selesai makan (inisial D) ini sdh baik sekali cara kerjanya, lalu dibantu oleh penerima tamu, untuk Menu dan kesigapan staff saya beri nilai 6

Secara keseluruhan Hotel ini BAIK untuk di singgahi, saya rekomendasikan untuk teman2 yang akan menginap disini

Thanks

Guntur

text:
Pada saat liburan sekolah anak, kami berlibur ke semarang dan menginap di hotel ini.. pelayanannya sangat memuaskan bagi kami. Kami tiba di hotel lebih awal (pagi hari) dan dibantu untuk early check in.. sambil menunggu kamar dipersiapkan, para staff sangat ramah dan salah satu staff hotel yang bernama Mr. Fauzi mengajak anak2 kami bermain dengan menggambar serta bercerita lucu sehingga anak2 kami sangat senang.. untuk bedroom and bathroomnya sendiri sangat bersih.. hotel ini terbilang masih baru.. untuk makanan di restorannya, enak-enak semua rasanya.. variasi pilihannya juga banyak.. kami sangat senang menginap di hotel ini, terlebih dengan para staff terutama Mr. Fauzi yang sangat ramah dan gesit dalam pelayanannya.. untuk harga menurut kami sangat sesuai dengan pelayanan, fasilitas hotel ini..
kalo ke semarang lagi kami akan menginap di hotel ini kembali..
2 thumbs up for this hotel.. very like with the hotel!
title: Good Hotel

text:
Secara keseluruhan dapat diniliai cukup karena ada beberapa kekurangan:
1. Bagian FO kurang cekatan dalam menangani proses cek in sehingga peserta rapat kami menunggu cukup lama dlam mendapatkan kamar
2. Bagian bonquet kurang cekatan juga. Peserta harus menunggu untuk mendapatkan makanan pada saat makan siang dan malam karena petugasnya kurang cekatan menambahkan makanan ke tempatnya padahal tempat sajiannya sudah kosong. Untuk makan siang dan malam, cita rasa masakannya biasa saja.
3. Lorong menuju ruang rapat beraroma kurang sedap sehingga perlu ditambah pengharum ruangan.
Kelebihannya:
1. Lokasi strategis dekat dengan mal dan terletak di dua jalur.
2. Seluruh staf hotelnya ramah.
3. Kamar bersih dan cukup luas.
4. Chanel tv banyak sehingga cukup menghibur setelah lelah seharian rapat/beraktivitas.
6. Untuk sarapan pagi variatif dan enak semua.
title: Cukup

text:
Lumayan, menurut kami untuk sebuah hotel yang strategis di kota Semarang, walaupun butuh waktu yang lama untuk cek in karena kami meminta kamar dengan tempat tidur besar tidak ada, sehingga perlu tambahan waktu untuk menggabungkan 2 tempat tidur kecil di kamar kami.

Terus terang kami mendapati towel yang tidak terlalu bersih di kamar kami, serta hal yang sangat menggu adalah pintu kamar mandi yang buka kedalam yang membuat akses keluar masuk kamar mandi yang cukup sulit, serta lantai kamar mandi yang dekil.

Makan pagi pun tidak terlalu istimewa, lumayan menurut kami.

text: Mencoba hotel hotel baru adalah bagian dari jalan hidup saya, dimana hal ini bertujuan untuk mengetahui tingkat pelayanan dan design interior hotel tersebut. Hotel ini terbilang baru  diwilayah Semarang Jawa tengah, walaupun letaknya tidak persis di tengah kota, namun hotel ini patut di kunjungi. Hotel Grandhika Semarang adalah hotel yang baru beberapa minggu yang lalu di resmikan oleh gubernur jawa tengah. Dengan pelayanan yang ramah dan hotel ini memiliki fasilitas  Kolam renang di lantai 5, lahan pakir di basement namun sangat terbatas jumlah kendaraan yang parkir di area tersebut , dan fasilitas GYM yang masih dalam proses penyelesaian. Menu sarapan yang standard. Itulah gambaran sekilas tentang hotel Grandhika di semarang dimana saya berkunjung menjelang akhir tahun yaitu  28 desember 2016 lalu. Semoga ini dapat menjadi gambaran bagi bapak dan ibu yang ingin berkunjung di Hotel Grandhika Semarang.

text:
Stay there for 2 nights on vacation to Semarang. The location is very good right in the main busy road with easy access to many highlight destinations. This hotel is rather new and more like a boutique hotel, not so big but functional. The hotel were busy during my stay as it was the period of Lebaran and school holiday. Some tiny bits of pastries and drinks while waiting for check in. The check in were rather slow, and as I booked 2 rooms, only one ready at a time (45 minutes early from the stated check in time).The second room available about 30 minutes past the official check in time.
The rooms are descent and airy, good lighting for hotel room, it is bright. Mine's located on the same floor as the swimming pool. Sometimes I look into details, my rooms seems to have flaw assembling on the door and the towel rack. The lobby and the hallway  are clean and smells good, which is great.
The swimming pool is rather small but descent and the glass design is cool. Breakfast were good tough not sumptuous in choices. I praise for the courteous staff all around the hotel, they are polite, smile and greets. 
I wish I could at least give this hotel rating "very good", but it still failed to plain pleased me, that's why I state "lots of room for improvement"
title: Lots of room for improvement

Please do keep your good work in the future GranDhika Pemuda Hotel

text:
[EXCELLENT HOSPITALITY]

I stayed at the hotel with my family only for transit (final destination Malang. I checked in at the hotel on 1:30 am and luckily there was still a non-smoking superior room available.  I still got warm assistance from the crew and receptionist even in the middle of the night.  

[MODERN, CLEAN, COMFORTABLE]

Bit surprise when I open my room door and see a modern, clean, and comfortable room for me and kiddos COMPARED with the price I paid (less than IDR 800K)

[GOOD BREAKFAST MENU]

Once again I got more compared to the price I paid. Good variation menu, with good taste (at least for my tongue). Just name it, you'll find most of the breakfast menu you're expected

[NICE POOL]

After breakfast and before continue my trip, me with the kiddos try to cooling down the temperature in the "what I called with SKYPOOL" as it located in 5th floor. Its very clean, and refreshing

[GOOD LOCATION]

Its located in the downtown of Semarang with about 10 mnts to Simpang Lima.. and the most important is, you can find Indomart, ATM Mandiri and BCA right in front and beside the hotel respectively. Speak about Street food?you will find it everywhere nearby the hotel

Overall Score: EXCELLENTO

will I stay at the hotel when I coming back to semarang?? Definitely its gonna be in the top of my list
title: Excellent hospitality and facility

Come at 2 pm and my room is not ready, they said due to the hotel was full. I ask how long I need to wait for my room. They cannot give me the right and exact time, the reception just said after 3 pm. Hey, come on, what time is it after 3 pm?? 8pm 9pm 12pm (so illogical).
I don't mind waiting, but the lobby was so hot!!! The Air con is off or broken!! Or even they do not operate the air con. Even the receptionist uses a small fan.
What I understand from this hotel is doesn't care about customer feedback because own by the government (BUMN).
Oh, My God!
Room 815 (8 Oct C/i)
title: Worst Hotel in Semarang

As Hotel owned by state enterprise Adhi Karya i expect good property on building, sadly this hotel property is somehow not maintain properly or not build properly ; let me tell one by one. text:
Hi all I stayed at 903 and 905. I was impressed by service from all employee there. Responsive security team, they put my car in front of entrance lobby parking lot, make me easily catch the lobby faster because I'm travelling with three kiddos. 
Front office staff all nice, make me feel at home. Helpfull restaurant staff, and good massage at Spa with affordable price. 
I think I'll come back again in few months with my family, untill an incident make me dissapointed. 
I did check-in at October 8th for two nights, then I ask the restaurant staff to keep my breastmilk at October 9th at their freezer. Four bags, each bag contain 250 ml breastmilk more or less. They said YES.
October 10th in the morning, I put another two bags again. When checked out at 12 pm, I fell shocked because when I receive my 6 bags of breastmilk, it didn't frozen at all  !! Even the colling gel also still in a liquid. 
I didn't have much time, so I asked the receptionist to look for some information then texted to my number. 
In the evening they texted me, they said their staff already put the breastmilk in the freezer and they only say sorry. They gave me some reason, and I don't care. They said the freezer were trouble, but no information to me before when I still stayed there. A reason is just a reason for me. I didn't replay at that time because I feel upset, my 6 bags of milks, which totals more than a liter almost spoilt. 
Yes I know it just A MILK for you all, but I let you know that my baby really depend on it. It's her food and drink, keep her alive everyday. I do pumping all day all night, I wake up every 3 hours even when you all sleep just to make sure that my baby has enough supply to eat and drink. I don't have any words to describe how dissapointed Iam !! 
Don't you know that breastmilk has different quality and durability when you put on freezer and chiller?? I have also, chiller, freezer, and deep freezer at home. So when you tell me that you already put my breastmilk at freezer, it's a BIG LIE. Because I know well the breastmilk will frozen quickly at deep freezer and what I've got is far from frozen. 
Thank you for broken my heart, I hope the management can do something to fix this.  So in the future, this situation won't happen again to another mom. And I wish your hotel support all woman to breastfeeding their children, as UNICEF and WHO suggest.
title: Dissapointed on how their treat my breastmilk

text:
I was doing my family trip on September, 14 to celebrate my mom's birthday. then order a deluxe room w/ breakfast.  because i've landed early in Semarang, i have call the receptionist, can i do the early check-in?. luckily, my room can be placed at 1 pm. 

For the room, it was very clean and quite big room, as i expected before when i ordered it. unfortunately, i don't know about the wall what material is it made of? a little bit sound came into my room, so it made me disturbed. After that, a little bit distract when i slept there was some mosquito in my room.

Then when i came for the breakfast, i know my room is include for 2 persons in breakfast, the offered me to buy 2 packages of breakfast or i can buy the ala carte menu. so i picked sauteed broccoli and sautee pokchoy for my sister on the ala carte menu. unfortunately, the waiter told me that the broccoli is nothing, i dont know how could it be, then i asked him to ordered 2 portion sauteed pokchoy in a plated.  but i'm disrespect to the another waiter who was tell me with a bad attitude that my vegetables wasnt include with the rice. yes i know in that menu, it has been noticed, but why he said like that?!. my appetite was lost plus my vegetables came so long around 20 minutes. Eventhough, the another waitress came to me offered orange juice.

For the food quality, overall it was good, especially for the cheese cake for celebrate my mom's birthday, she likes it. but a little make a great improvement to the asian food, cause of a little bit tasteless.

For the security and parking area it's good, he direct me to park my car on the bottom basement because the first basement parking was full, i'll appreciate it 

Thankyou for the moment, hope can be improve the hospitality, service and attitude  to make guest comfort to stay not for a while but a till 2-3 nights.
title: Unforgettable moment

text:
Love this new hotel, the room (executive deluxe) is very comfortable and spacious. Booked through direct website and got complimentary minibar & late check out (if available)
Bathroom is gigantic, water pressure is good and their TV is modern with numbers of great international channels (thumbs up)
Check in and check out was smooth, only Wifi is mediocre only 2mbps which I believe nowhere to go in terms of speed for nowadays
Location is in the city center, easy to access everywhere and from / to airport
Convenient store is located just across the hotel, be mindful if you drive, parking space is very limited here
Overall, was delightful experience to stay in this hotel and very recommended

Definitely will use this hotel again if I am in Semarang.

text:
I stayed here early February 2019 and booked 2 deluxe rooms : twin bed & double bed. I was really enjoying my stay here and really lazy to go out from room.

The twin bed room is not too big with soft carpet which really loved by my children. My double bed is very spacious and have enough space for my child to run. 
Both are completed by sofa, small round table, refrigerator, LED/LCD tv, slippers, and minibar.
Bathroom is a rain shower typical and completed by hair dryer and toiletries.

For breakfast, I think this hotel offering various menu start from porridge, salad, main menu which consist of Indonesian food and western, omelette, noodle, bakery and pudding, and fruits. Unfortunatelly I didn't find sushi in their breakfast menu that  day and the western menu not too varied. But I really satisfied with the breakfast.
The staff also really spry to clean up the dirty plate. 

This hotel has fitness centre, swimming pool and spa. The swimming pool and fitness centre are located in the 5th floor. It is a sky pool but I was amazed that the water is not cold, but warm enough for my child to swim.

What I expect much for this hotel improvement is car park. They have basement car park, but the access to the basement is very limited for my SUV car. I really have to adjust my car position to get to the lobby from basement. I hope the management will improve the access to the car park.
title: Nice hotel with various breakfast

text:
I had spent a night with my family in this hotel, the staff is really helpful and friendly, i love that they cater to you need seriously

The rooms are bigger than i thought ( i booked deluxe rooms), we are located in floor 5, which is the same location as pool, spa and gym. My daughter loves the pool, and we can easily go there because we are in the same floor

The only cons is the breakfast, they have enough variety of food but some of food just taste so so or even poor (too salty), the waffle is hard to chew, some of food that tastes great are they potatoes, bubur manis, jamu beras kencur, pancake, etc.

I will recommend people with all kind of purpose in semarang to stay in this hotel! If they can upgrade their food, it will be superb!
title: Great location, great staff, great room, so so breakfast

text:
Picked this hotel for a 4 night stay and due to its proximity to local sites and THE shopping mall in Semarang Paragon Mall.
I booked through Agoda, paid for a Premier room (for 3 pax)but when I compared the room layout/furnishing on the hotel 
lobby gallery , the room they gave me upon check in was NOT a premier room but a category lower ie executive category.
This was on level three, a large communication tower right smack in front of our room window and a large noisy generator too.  We asked to change room but they said they were full and offered us a much smaller room. 
The last straw was at 5.30am  there was music from below our room which I later found out was the ballroom 
and someone was rehearsing for the weekend event.
Thankfully all these noises stopped on the second day.
Breakfast wasn’t of much taste and quality,  only the egg station was ok. On the day of check out we booked the airport shuttle for 6.30am. Promptly we were at the lobby at 6.30 but didn’t set off for the airport until 6.40 as the driver has not turned up.  The front desk person had to drive us to airport and thankfully we reached in time.
The front desk does not have any city map nor were knowledgeable about travel agents in the vicinity nor 
where to buy intercity bus tickets.  They were all smiling and courteous but not very efficient as a hotel.
title: Tried a local hotel chain in Semarang

text:
I was on business trip to Semarang, then I decided to book via Traveloka because reviewer said it was excellent hotel.
The hotel located in heart of Semarang, near many office/government building. It’s only 5 minutes to Paragorn Mall and about 10 minutes to Lawang Sewu / Simpang Lima.
Check in process was quick. The front desk staff are friendly and helpful since I came at 10 o clock.

The room are quite big, about 24 sqm and it has huge window so we could see Semarang cityscape at night from above. The room facilities is standard for 4 stars hotel. Free mineral water, Coffee and Tea, Hair dryer , etc. but unfortunately it has Smart TV with few channel to watch. I guess they should add more TV channel.

I also tried room service for clothes pressing. They could give express pressing just only 30 minutes since we gave the clothes.

The food are great, many variations of food.

Overall it was good hotel when you go on business trip or maybe family trip.
title: Great hotel in heart of Semarang

text:
Went for a few days stay. 
Well located just on the main road of Semarang. 

When i first reached the hotel, it seems to be very mell maintained. 
although the lobby itself is not the most spacious, however it is very neatly designed with very good use of space. 

The cleanliness of the hotel is top notch. 
hotel employees were also very well mannered and helpful.

The room that I got was the single king size Bed. the room itself is very spacious, has a very good air conditioning system.
the bathroom was a decent size, very small if compared to the room. However i feel that the i happened to get one of the bigger size room (probably for a family, hence the bigger space) 

hot water system ran perfectly without any problems. and the cleanliness of the room was also very good. 

The breakfast buffet was quite okay. Not the best of choice But it has all the standard options such as Indonesian food, porridge, soups, and bakeries. 

Overall, this hotel offers great value for money. Whether it is for a business or even a family trip.
title: Great value for money!

text:
This hotel surprised me.  I normally rare to order nasi goreng in a resto.  But this time,  as I drive for 7 hours and arrived at night, i decided to just order a simple dish from my room, Nasi Goreng Kampung.  Fried rice with sunny side egg and beef satay.  It taste so good..  I have a page in instagram @culiture which I post many different food.  But unfortunately when I ate this Nasi Goreng Kampung,  i totally forgot to take the picture. That's how good it is. 

The room is modern and clean.  The breakfast is just ok,  and i really appreciate that they serve Jamu, Indonesian herbal drinks.

They had rather tight space for car park. I suggest the hotel to consider make the hotel bigger so it has spacious lobby and car park. 

Overall,  I like this hotel.
title: I like their Nasi Goreng Kampung and Kunyit Asem

Hotel room is clean and spacious with modern interior just as in the picture, all staff are very attentive and communicative to make sure we have a pleasant stay. Location is really family friendly just check the map, its located in many nearby attraction and restourant to explore..

text:
Just came back from our Semarang trip 2 days ago. Was here with my 3 young daughters and husband. We booked a premier double room. This room does not have a bath tub. What I liked about the toilet is it has a bidet (most of the public toilet in Semarang has this). Wifi signal was good. Tried the foot massage at the hotel’s spa, quite pricey compared to those outside. Breakfast was fair. I had 5 days of breakfast in the hotel and the menu was the same throughout. However, the restaurant serves delectable food. Have tried the sirloin steak, soto, spaghetti, ayam bakar (grilled chicken) all taste good and worth the money spent. Staff were very friendly and helpful. We enjoyed our stay here.

Some feedback:
The hotel might want to display brochures or pamphlet to tourist on the places of interest in Semarang. Maybe collaborate with tour guides.
title: Affordable and Comfortable

text:
Staying in GranDhika Pemuda in deluxe room for three nights. Prime location. Spacious room. Nice view. Nice bed and pillow. Excellent service and assistance from hotel staff. 

But there's one thing that really annoyed me was i could hear almost every voice from the hallway, and even from neighboring room. Maybe because their room partition didn't made from concrete? 

TV channels were limited, and had slow response. Internet connection was fast, but not that stable, got disconeccted many times. Breakfast taste was excellent, but need more menu variations. 

In the end, this is a good hotel, but still need some improvements. Nice effort from Adhi Karya who just started a hotel business.
title: Brand new hotel, nice experience

text:
I stayed for one night for business trip in early August 2017, it was my second experience. They even upgraded my room into Grandhika Premiere since the deluxe room was full in that time. The room was so spacious with great amenities and also had working desk corner. The view from room was great since it was on the 7th floor (if im not mistaken).

The staff was very friendly and really helpful (I had minor issue with the key card and they were really helpful), the food was great. All in all, Hotel Grandhika is a great place to stay in Semarang with affordable price and strategic location.

text:
El hotel es bastante sencillo y nos ha dado la impresión que no suelen recibir muchos clientes occidentales. Nuestra habitación tenía un tamaño y mobiliario correctos. .Las sábanas y toallas estaban lavadas pero con un color un poco feo.... Había unas pequeñas hormigas en el cuarto de baño y avisamos para que viniesen a fumigar.
Estuvimos un rato en la piscina en la que no había ningún otro huésped, pedimos unas bebidas pero el chico que atendía no hablaba inglés y tuvo que venir alguien de recepción para saber lo que estábamos pidiendo.
La atención buena, son bastante amables.
El desayuno con poca variedad y más orientado al cliente asiático.
El hotel está cera de un centro comercial aunque las calles no están pensadas para peatones y el corto trayecto hasta él es un poco incómodo.
Nos atendieron bien y fueron bastante amables pero no llegamos a sentirnos cómodos sino fuera de lugar.
title: Qué hago aquí?

text:
das Hotel ist neu und daher schaut alles optisch auch ganz gut aus. Allerdings ein minimalis Hotel. Schon bei der Ankunft steht man in einer Lobby wo man fast Platzangst bekommen kann. ok ist übertrieben aber echt winzig. Die Standart Zimmer sind sehr klein. Für eine Person noch ok aber 2 ?!?!
Das Frühstück ist indonesisch und weit weg von einem Internationalen Standart. 
Das Personal ist super! Sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Echt top. Wenn man für Buisnes unterwegs ist dann ist es ok für 1-2 Nächte. Urlaub sollte man ein grösseres Hotel nehmen. Es ist ein billiges Standart Hotel. National evtl 4 Sterne aber international maximum 2
title: gutes neues Hotel aber nur für kurzaufenthalt
